body: query { campaignlist (pagination:{limit: "10"}){ campaigns { id, name, description, allow_prepaid, show_prepaid, created_at, updated_at, productschedules { id, merchantprovidergroup{ id, merchantproviderconfigurations { merchantprovider { id, name, processor { name }, processing { monthly_cap, discount_rate, transaction_fee, reserve_rate, maximum_chargeback_ratio, transaction_counts { daily, weekly, monthly } }, enabled, gateway { ... on NMI { name, username, password, processor_id } ... on Innovio { name, username, password, product_id } ... on Stripe {name, api_key} }, allow_prepaid, accepted_payment_methods, customer_service { email, url, description }, created_at, updated_at }, distribution }, created_at, updated_at }, schedule { price, start, end, period, product { id, name, sku, ship, shipping_delay, fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { ... on Hashtag { name, username, password, threepl_customer_id, threepl_key } ... on ThreePL { name, username, password, threepl_customer_id, threepl_key, threepl_id, threepl_facility_id } ... on ShipStation { name, api_key, api_secret } ... on TestFulfillmentProvider { name } } } } } } emailtemplates { id, name, subject, body, type, smtp_provider{ id, name, hostname, username, password, port } }, affiliate_allow { ... on AffiliateGroup { id, name } ... on Affiliate { id, affiliate_id, name, created_at, updated_at } } affiliate_deny { ... on AffiliateGroup { id, name } ... on Affiliate { id, affiliate_id, name, created_at, updated_at } } }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page } }, }
